Name: The ScreaMaze
About the game: Gameplay: Take your mouse and try to reach the exit of the maze without touching walls and before the end of the timer . Will you try to beat your best score if you lose? Features: Very simple gameplay, you only need a mouse to play Unlimited playing time with the procedural maze generation Progressive difficulty Your score is saved for the next time Three different endings
